stimulusHtml: Over the time interval 0 ≤ t ≤ 5, a particle moves along the x-axis. The graph of the particle’s velocity, v, is shown above. Over the time interval 0 ≤ t ≤ 5, the particle’s displacement is 3 and the particle travels a total distance of 13.
